title: Russell Finex Celebrates 80 Years of Excellence
text:
Russell Finex Celebrates 80 Years of Excellence Monday, September 21, 2015 by Russell Finex Print Email 
Russell Finex has been innovating processing technology since 1934. 2014 marks 80 years of growth and excellence. 
With more than 200 direct employees and annual sales that exceed £25m ($40m), Russell Finex has become one of the largest companies in the industry. 
With appearances at some of the largest global trade exhibitions, and with offices in the UK, US, Belgium and India, Russell Finex has made an impact on a majority of the world's markets. 
Russell Finex US Operations president Rob Ward said: "Russell Finex have continued to strengthen their position as the leaders in our industry. 
"Our ability to continuously produce innovative technology has solidified the company's position in the market." 
The company has continued to pride itself in offering the widest range of sieving and filtration equipment in the industry. Within the past 80 years, the company's fine mesh separation technology, vibratory sieves, separators, ultrasonic mesh deblinding systems and liquid filters have been supplied to more than 140 countries. 
As Russell Finex expands their portfolio and global footprint, its innovative thinking, technology and engineering expertise will continue to transform the industry. 
Another aspect that has contributed to Russell Finex's excellence over the past 80 years is the solid reputation the company has built with its customers. 
The Russell Finex mission 'Customer Trust is a Russell Must' has upheld the company to high quality standards. 
By working with some of the world's leading brands, such as 3M, Nestlé, General Mills and Unilever, Russell Finex have dedicated efforts to ensuring the customer experience is one that is valued forever. 
Russell Finex's customised solutions, comprehensive customer service, specialised test facilities and emphasis on innovation set a reputable standard in the industry. 
For 80 years, the company has maintained that standard, and plans to focus on the future to provide even better quality and service for years to come. 
Russell Finex managing director Ray Singh said: "The success of the company and its longevity is a testament to the Russell Finex employees, past and present, who have always put unrivalled customer service and product innovation at the heart of what they do every day." Follow Us:
